title: Quarkus 2.2.1.Final released - Hardening release
content: Today we announce the availability of Quarkus 2.2.1.Final, which is the result of our first hardening cycle. Indeed, for 2.2, we decided to slow down on adding new features and focus this release cycle on hardening Quarkus with 3 main focuses: Fix issues Improve usability Improve documentation Thus the list...
